channel.title: Mint on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Mint on Strat

item.title: Gin-Gin Mule
item.description: Tastes like a less minty and more gingery Southside cocktail. It’s dayum good.

item.title: Southside Cocktail
item.description: The mint garnish pokes at your nose while you drink this minty cocktail. If you like mint with your mint for more mint per square mint then this is the cocktail for you.
